binding:binding.name: AppleTV Binding
binding:binding.description: This is the binding for AppleTV.
binding:binding.author: Markus Michels

parameter.name: pairingPIN
parameter.label: Pairing PIN
parameter.description: Pairing the openHAB remote with a selected Apple-TV requires a PIN. Go to Settings->Genera->Remotes on the TV screen/Apple-TV and start pairing. You should see a new remote (openHAB), select ""add remote" and enter the pairing PIN code. Sometimes the new remote doesn't show up, in this case you need to restart your Apple-TV

parameter.name: remoteName
parameter.label: Remote Name
parameter.description: This text specifies the remote name, which is used for pairing.

parameter.name: doPairing
parameter.label: Do Pairing
parameter.description: Enable this option to start device pairing. You need to go to Settings->Genera->Remotes on the TV screen/Apple-TV. Once pairing is initiated you should see a new remote. Add the remote and enter the PIN code. Sometimes the new remote doesn't show up, in this case you need to restart your Apple-TV.

parameter.name: updateInterval
parameter.label: Status Update Interval
parameter.description: The play status (e.g. position) gets updated periodically. Default: 3sec Avoid too much polling by selecting a meaningful value, especially if you have multiple Apple-TVs.

parameter.name: libPath
parameter.label: Library Path
parameter.description: The binding brings some required modules, which will be installed in the selected folder. Default: A temporary folder in <temp-dir>/ohlib-<generated id>, The changes gets active next time the binding is started.
